cause.description:
This isn't a religion, this isn't atheists for the end of faith. This is my simple view that I must share. Religion kills people, so end it. This is a personal decision that should be based around families, not countries, enemies, and differences. They all have glaring similiarities, why not focus on those instead?
1. End organized religion
2. A world without war
3. Make this a personal decision only
cause.name: End the insanity
